page.title: 17THE DOG AND GUN INN
page.content: The Dog and Gun, Glusburn is situated on the Colne-Keighley road.It is an old-fashioned,comfortable inn with oak beams and stone walls.It is ornamented by horse brasses,copper utensils and maps of the area. There is a separate dining-room in the extension and a small beer garden. Every Monday night a Folk Evening is held where anyone wishing to play an instrument or sing, may do so. Competitions are held from time to time.The current prize is an autographed cricket bat. The Dog and Gun provide daily bar snacks.Starters include soup at 60p to Yorkshire Pudding at 80p.Main courses range from pork sausage at Â£1.80 to steak costing Â£5.80.There are a good range of sandwiches which include cheese,ham and prawn.Sweets change daily and all cost 95p.
